text: Ford Theatre may refer to *Ford Theatre, 1940s-50s anthology series on American radio and TV *Ford's Theatre, Washington, D.C. where U.S. President Abraham Lincoln was assassinated *Ford Theatre (band), American psychedelic rock band, active 1966–1971 *John Anson Ford Amphitheatre, Hollywood Hills, Los Angeles - a music venue *Ford Theatre at E Center, West Valley City, Utah - a multi-purpose venue ==See also== *Ford's Grand Opera House, a theatre and musical venue in Baltimore, Maryland
title: Ford Theatre (disambiguation)
